title: Rin x Sen: Hakudaku Onna Kyoushi to Yaroudomo
synopsis: Urara starts working at a girls' school. She is now happy because she will get married in a few months. But one day, her fiance suddenly goes missing since his business didn't go well. Months later, Yuji, a debt collector, comes to her house, but she doesn't have enough money to pay. Yuji offers her to work at a boys' school his friend works. He also says if she works there for a month, she won't need to pay back money. She finally decides to accept his offer without knowing the fact that the school is full of evil teachers and students....
related_anime: ['Rin x Sen + Ran -> Sem: Cross Mix']
characters: ['Ebihara, Urara', 'Okita, Asuka', 'Kijima, Yuuji', 'Kurose, Tatsuya', 'Hirukawa, Keizou', 'Mizushima, Kaho']
staff: [['Yokoyama, Hiromi', ['Director']], ['Lee, Si-Min', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Guilty', ['Original Creator']]]
